SELECT o.id, o.ddh, o.ddmc, o.ddmc as name, s.khdwmc, GROUP_CONCAT( b.fzx ORDER BY b.fzx SEPARATOR '、' ) fzx , STR_TO_DATE ( o.jhjqc, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) as jhjqc, STR_TO_DATE ( o.jhjqd, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) as jhjqd, o.xsjl, STR_TO_DATE ( o.createdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as cjddrq, s.int_id as tjm FROM md_createorder o INNER JOIN crm_sellcustomer s ON s.id = o.khdwmcid LEFT JOIN md_orderandfzx ox ON ox.ddid = o.id LEFT JOIN sys_branch b ON b.branch_id = ox.fzxid
o.spzt = 4 AND o.bgzt IN ( 4, 5 ) AND o.is_delete = 0
AND o.khdwmcid = #{param.customerId}
GROUP BY o.id ORDER BY o.createdate DESC

select m.id, oa.combostate, m.tjtcmc, m.tjtcmc as name, m.tjlx, m.syxb, m.zhjg, m.tcysjg, m.tczk, m.fkfs, m.sfyhtc, m.nlz, m.nld, m.jhys, m.tjtcjc, m.zytjlb from md_createmeal m inner join md_orderandcombo oa on oa.tcid = m.id and oa.ddid = #{id} union all select m.id, oa.combostate, m.tjtcmc, m.tjtcmc as name, m.tjlx, m.syxb, m.zhjg, m.tcysjg, m.tczk, m.fkfs, m.sfyhtc, m.nlz, m.nld, m.jhys, m.tjtcjc, m.zytjlb from md_createcombo m inner join md_orderandcombo oa on oa.tcid = m.id and oa.ddid = #{id}

select group_concat(harm_name) as harmName from md_harm where id in
#{id}

SELECT i.id, i.examfeeitem_name as sfxmmc, i.xb, p.print_name as printType, i.unitprice as jg, i.jcyy, i.bz, i.tjlx as tjlx, i.depart_name as ssks FROM md_items i
LEFT JOIN md_mealanditem m ON m.sfxmid = i.id
LEFT JOIN md_comboanditem m ON m.sfxmid = i.id
LEFT JOIN md_printtype p ON p.id = i.xsdyfl WHERE m.tcid = #{param.tcid}
